trans-unit.source: Represents a user identity authenticated using forms authentication.
This class cannot be inherited.
The FormsIdentity class is used by the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> when a user is authenticated with forms authentication.
An instance of the FormsIdentity class is created using the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket> that is decrypted from the forms-authentication cookie or from the URL.

The new instance of the FormsIdentity class is used to construct a new <xref:System.Security.Principal.GenericPrincipal> object that is set as the value of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property for the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity"></xref> class.
The authentication ticket upon which this identity is based.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity"></xref> class based on the specified identity.
The identity upon which this identity is based.
Gets the type of authenticated identity.
The type of authenticated identity.
This property always returns "Forms".
Gets the collection of claims that are associated with this identity.
The collection of claims.
Gets a copy of the current <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity"></xref> instance.
A copy of the current <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity"></xref> instance.
Gets a value that indicates whether authentication took place.
This property always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets the user name of the forms identity.

The Name property returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket.Name%2A> property from the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket> supplied to the constructor.
The user name of the forms identity.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket"></xref> for the forms-authentication user identity.
The <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationTicket"></xref> supplied to the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsIdentity.%23ctor%2A> constructor for the current object.
